sentences.en: A fishing boat came out of nowhere, dead ahead.
sentences.cn: 一艘渔船不知从什么地方冒了出来，就在正前方。

sentences.en: A fishing vessel and a cargo ship collided in rough seas.
sentences.cn: 一艘捕鱼船和一艘货船在波涛汹涌的海上相撞了。

sentences.en: Despite the poor weather the fishing has been pretty good.
sentences.cn: 尽管天气恶劣，却渔获颇丰。

sentences.en: Fishermen from Bristol disputed fishing rights with the Danes.
sentences.cn: 布里斯托尔的渔民与丹麦人争夺捕鱼权。

sentences.en: Fishing is one of his hobbies.
sentences.cn: 钓鱼是他的一项业余爱好。

sentences.en: Fishing tackle is available for hire.
He flashed his light into the boat and saw the fishing-line.
sentences.cn: 他朝船上照去，看见了钓鱼线。

sentences.en: He has posted a sign up that says "No Fishing"
sentences.cn: 他已经张贴了一张“禁止钓鱼”的告示牌。

sentences.en: He suggested that tangling fishing gear should be made a criminal offence.
sentences.cn: 他提议，缠绕捕鱼器材应该算刑事犯罪。

sentences.en: I could see the fishing boat to starboard.
sentences.cn: 我能看到右侧的那艘渔船。

sentences.en: Let each child have a turn at fishing.
Many Bangladeshis were employed in the construction or fishing industries.
sentences.cn: 许多孟加拉国人都从事建筑业或渔业。

sentences.en: Port-Louis is an attractive little fishing port.
sentences.cn: 路易港是个漂亮的小渔港。

sentences.en: Terry’s going fishing at Lake Arrowhead next weekend.
sentences.cn: 特里下周末要到阿罗黑德湖钓鱼。

sentences.en: The fishing boat harbour was usually bustling with lots of local colour.
sentences.cn: 该渔港通常都是一派热闹繁忙的景象，很有地方色彩。

sentences.en: they worried about an FBI fishing expedition.
sentences.cn: 他们对美国联邦调查局的一项调查忧心忡忡。

words.tran_cn: 鱼的；可疑的；似鱼的；呆滞的

trans.tran_en: the sport or business of catching fish
